## What
- [ ] Linked Issue: Closes #
- [ ] OpenSpec change-id: `openspec/changes/<change-id>/`

## Checklist
- [ ] Scope limited to one module/capability
- [ ] Specs updated (`openspec/specs/**` or `openspec/changes/**`)
- [ ] Validation run (tests / manual steps documented)
- [ ] No secrets committed (tokens/keys/logs)
